channel.title: Pimpscape Teleport Glitch
channel.description: Does anyone know a fix for the Pimpscape teleport glitch where when you teleport you appear in the spot but your character is only the small dot thing and you cant move untill you logout and login? xD

item.title: Pimpscape Teleport Glitch
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

[code] if (s == “Varrock”)
{
teleX = 3489;
teleY = 3288;
setAnimation(1979);
newheightLevel = 0;
}

 if (s == "Falador")
 {
    teleX = 3489;
    teleY = 3288;
setAnimation(1979);        
    newheightLevel = 0;
         
 }

 if (s == "Lumby")
 {
    teleX = 3489;
    teleY = 3288;
setAnimation(1979);        
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Camelot")
 {
    teleX = 3489;
    teleY = 3288;
setAnimation(1979);        
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Ardougne")
 {

    teleY = 3288;
setAnimation(1979);        
    newheightLevel = 0;
    
 }

 if (s == "Watchtower")
 {
    teleX = 3489;
    teleY = 3288;
setAnimation(1979);        
    newheightLevel = 0;
    
 }

 if (s == "Trollheim")
 {
    teleX = 3489;
    teleY = 3288;
setAnimation(1979);        
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Ape")
 {
    teleX = 3489;
    teleY = 3288;
setAnimation(1979);        
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }
if (s == "Paddewwa"){

    teleX = 3489; 
    teleY = 3288;
stillgfx(392, absY, absX);
setAnimation(1979);        
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Senntisten”){

    teleX = 3489; 
    teleY = 3288;
stillgfx(392, absY, absX);
setAnimation(1979);        
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Kharyrll”){

    teleX = 3489; 
    teleY = 3288;
stillgfx(392, absY, absX);
setAnimation(1979);        
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }
if (s == "Lasaar"){

    teleX = 3489; 
    teleY = 3288;
stillgfx(392, absY, absX);
setAnimation(1979);        
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }
if (s == "Carrallangar"){

    teleX = 3489; 
    teleY = 3288;
setAnimation(1979);        
stillgfx(392, absY, absX);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Annakarl”){

    teleX = 3489; 
    teleY = 3288;
setAnimation(1979);        
stillgfx(392, absY, absX);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Gharrok”){

    teleX = 3489;
    teleY = 3288;
setAnimation(1979);        
stillgfx(392, absY, absX);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }[/code]

Replace yours with those ^^^ Maybe that will work?
